DOC.brief_summary: To investigate skeletal effect Thai traditional massage examining change biochemical marker bone turnover .
DOC.brief_title: Thai Traditional Massage Increases Biochemical Marker Bone Formation Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman EXclusion Criteria : History hyperthyroidism , thyrotoxicosis , diabetes , rheumatoid arthritis cancer glucocorticoid medication osteoporosis Swelling joint
